Installing¶

The following items have to be installed in order to use BlockBall:

Java¶

Java 8, Java 9 or Java 10 can be used to run BlockBall.

Spigot/CraftBukkit/Sponge¶

  • Spigot ✔
  • PaperSpigot ✔
  • CraftBukkit ✔
  • Sponge ✘ (not compatible)

WorldEdit¶

The plugin WorldEdit is required for using BlockBall.

Download¶

You can download the latest release of BlockBall from github. It is also possible to check the signature or download the javadocs from the repository .

If you always want to be the first person to test the latest features, you can also download snapshots for future versions.
